content.rendered:
This is a 2014 release of the Yamazaki Mizunara – a no-age statement, single malt Japanese whisky, which matures in casks made from Mizunara Oak. These special casks impart some beautifully unique hints of sandalwood and fragrant of wood that make this whisky a truly singular experience.

Yamazaki Mizunara 2014 Awards
Gold Medal (International Spirits Challenge, 2017)
Gold Medal (International Spirits Challenge, 2015)

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Yamazaki
Bottled: 2014
Single Malt: Yes
Alcohol Strength: 45%
Bottle Size: 700ml
Weight: 2 Kg
